channel.title: Wiki Theme Tweaks
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wiki Theme Tweaks" - Font size, color, back-ground color.

item.title: Re: Wiki Theme Tweaks
item.content:encoded:
Don't worry. It doesn't matter where you post. It is my fault for creating 2 treads in the first place.

About the different color for odd and even posts. It can't be done. Only Opera and Google Chrome Shows them correctly. The other browsers don't support this. Also note that this css is built over a site structure I can't change.

I will change the color of the post title though.

item.title: Re: Wiki Theme Tweaks
item.content:encoded:
Only two things come to mind:

1) Some kind individual background for posts in forum. Would be great if slightly different color was for odd or even posts.

2) I don't know if this would look better but try adding empty space(5-10px) over left menu(and top border for it). So it looks like it is connected to left side of screen not hanging from top menu.

edit: Sorry for posting it in wrong thread.
